4ZD.F.summary: Penneo ApS, a software-as-a-service company, provides an eco-system of automation solutions that digitizes companies' workflows of signing and managing documents. It digitizes, automates, and secures digital document handling workflows. The company serves customers in various industries, such as property management, finance, real estate, HR, and legal. Penneo ApS was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

50O.F.summary: Shape Robotics A/S, an educational technology company, develops robot systems for education purpose worldwide. The company develops Fable, a robot system that offers educational robot kits for use in teaching programs, robotics, and innovations in middle and secondary schools, as well as in universities. It also offers Fable Connect, a telepresence robotics system that enables schools to get homebound students back in the classroom using the robot as a communication device. The company sells its products directly, as well as through distributors and resellers. Shape Robotics A/S was founded in 2011 and is based in Farum, Denmark.

5IJ.F.summary: Conferize A/S develops an online software solution for event and conference market. Its primary product is event management software, which enables event organizers to solve various digital tasks needed to host an event. The company serves event organizers and attendees. It operates in approximately 140 countries. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

6VB.F.summary: Valuer Holding A/S operates a platform for the management of workflows to corporations, accelerators, and venture funds worldwide. Its products include Innovation Themes, a solution to predict, evaluate, and prioritize innovation areas mission critical to the users' business through data-driven intelligence; and Innovation Radar, a solution that allows users to monitor the technology and business model landscapes relevant to their organization. The company also provides Diligence-as-a-Service, as well as strategy and scaling advisory services. It serves customers in the healthcare and biotechnology, cyber security, energy, mobility, industrial engineering, financial services, sustainability, and other industries. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

6VZ.MU.summary: Trustpilot Group plc operates a review platform for businesses and consumers in the United Kingdom, North America, and internationally. Its online review platform that enables consumers to make purchasing decisions, and businesses to showcase their service. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

7VL.F.summary: Realfiction Holding AB (publ) manufactures and sells mixed reality solutions for retail, education, events, and brand activations worldwide. The company offers Dreamoc HD3, a platform for grabbing attention in commercial setting; DeepFrame, a mixed-reality display system; Dreamoc POP3, a display to create attention around a campaign or product launch; Dreamoc XL3; and Dreamoc XL4, a high-quality 3D holographic display that creates an eye-catching visual experience. It also provides Dreamoc XXL3, a mixed reality display and optimal solution for creating experiences in environments, such as malls, museums, and busy trade fairs; and Dreamoc Diamond, a display solutions for events and brand activations in shopping malls, trade fairs, and other traffic locations. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

8ND.F.summary: DecideAct A/S develops cloud-based strategy execution management and governance platform for organizations. Its solutions include DecideAct Professional, a digital solution for strategy implementation and follow-up; DecideAct Managed, a managed platform for strategy execution management and governance to drive engagement through transparency, automated follow-ups, and reporting; DecideAct Enterprise, a digital solution to integrate with ERP systems and other data sources defined by the organization; DecideAct Public Sector, which helps in the execution of government priorities within public institutions; a corporate social responsibility solution; a crisis recovery platform for enabling organizations to execute their recovery plan; and strategy expert services. The company's integrated strategy implementation platform delivers transparency, accountability, follow-up, and governance. DecideAct A/S was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in NexÃ¸, Denmark.

8WX.F.summary: Risma Systems A/S offers a software suite for governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) activities for private and public sectors in Denmark. The company offers GRC platform, a cloud-based Software-as-a-service solution which helps organizations to automate, report, and document controls across the organization through software. Its platform provides solutions for GRC, including privacy and general data protection regulation; information security management system; risk management; financial controls; and incident, policy, and vendor management sysyems. Risma Systems A/S was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Herlev, Denmark.

8XT.F.summary: Nexcom A/S, a software as a service company, engages in the development of software solutions for the automation of customer services in Denmark. Its services include digital process optimization, digital workflow, and interaction artificial intelligence and machine learning. The company also offers digital workflow platforms; eTray, a digital workflow management software; and IT related consulting services. It serves companies, such as telephony, insurance, energy, and property management, which serves large number of customers. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Karlslunde, Denmark.

9HY.F.summary: Hypefactors A/S operates as a software company that provides a technology platform. The company operates an artificial intelligence-based PR automation platform to power the PR workflow and various facts to document the results. It serves enterprises, small and medium sized companies, and PR agencies. The company is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

9R6.F.summary: Scape Technologies A/S, a robotics company, develops and sells bin-picking systems based on 3D computer vision. It provides SCAPE software for handling random, structured, and semi-structured components; SCAPE Picker tool for collection, controlling, and placing of subcomponents and parts; SCAPE Bin-Picking Manager, a software which handles recognition and picking of parts; SCAPE Communication Server, which enables communication of robot movements and status between SCAPE controller and robot controller; and SCAPE Calibration Manager, an application used for configuring all the units in a work cell. The company also offers SCAPE Part Training Studio, an application for training new parts based on a CAD files; software for structured and random parts; SCAPE Tool Units and Grippers; SCAPE 3D Scanner Recognition solutions; SCAPE Automatic Self Test and Cast Station for verifying the calibration of sensors and functionality of grippers; SCAPE 3D Orientation Control, which helps to handle parts for precision delivery for further processes; SCAPE Controller PC used to run with SCAPE software and hardware modules; and SCAPE Hardware Module solutions. In addition, it offers solutions for gripping and sorting packets and letters for distribution for logistic markets. Scape Technologies A/S was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Odense, Denmark.

ACT.CO.summary: DecideAct A/S develops cloud-based strategy execution management and governance platform for organizations. Its solutions include DecideAct Professional, a digital solution for strategy implementation and follow-up; DecideAct Managed, a managed platform for strategy execution management and governance to drive engagement through transparency, automated follow-ups, and reporting; DecideAct Enterprise, a digital solution to integrate with ERP systems and other data sources defined by the organization; DecideAct Public Sector, which helps in the execution of government priorities within public institutions; a corporate social responsibility solution; a crisis recovery platform for enabling organizations to execute their recovery plan; and strategy expert services. The company's integrated strategy implementation platform delivers transparency, accountability, follow-up, and governance. DecideAct A/S was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in NexÃ¸, Denmark.

AGILC.CO.summary: Agillic A/S, a software company, provides marketing platform that enables clients to create and automate data-driven and personalized communication across channels in Denmark and internationally. It offers customer marketing platform that enables omnichannel marketing, which helps clients to communicate with message consistency across channels, such as email, SMS, app push notifications, and digital ads, as well as one-to-one personalization and transgressing the limitations of a segmented approach. The company also provides training and professional services related to on-boarding and setup of infrastructure, template design, and implementation, as well as training of new and existing clients. It serves retail, finance, travel and leisure, and NGO and charity industries, as well as subscription-based businesses. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

BETCO.ST.summary: Better Collective A/S, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a sports betting media company worldwide. It connects sports enthusiastic bettors with betting operators through various technologies and digital media products. The company primarily focuses on online sports betting and casino marketing platforms. It operates various community-based digital platforms, including bettingexpert.com and speltips.se; owns and operates esports platforms HLTV.org and Dust2.dk; and vegasinsider.com, a source for sports betting information. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

CBRAIN.CO.summary: cBrain A/S, a software company, develops software for government, unions, and private knowledge firms in Denmark. It provides cBrain F2, a software tool that digitizes various workflows, knowledge processing, records management, and communication, including social media, as well as supports PCs and mobiles/tablets. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

CONFRZ.CO.summary: Conferize A/S develops an online software solution for event and conference market. Its primary product is event management software, which enables event organizers to solve various digital tasks needed to host an event. The company serves event organizers and attendees. It operates in approximately 140 countries. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

ENALYZ.CO.summary: Enalyzer A/S provides solutions for the measurement and analysis of employee satisfaction, and customer and citizen views on various topics worldwide. The company offers Enalyzer, a software product for running surveys. It also provides consulting, training, and support services. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

FASTPC.CO.summary: FastPassCorp A/S provides enterprise password management solutions for enterprises and managed service providers in Denmark. It offers Fastpass Enterprise Password Manager for password self-service and compliance for corporations; Facilitated Password Reset for the service desk process; Fastpass Cloud Password Manager, a Web based password manager for medium and large companies who want to improve productivity and security related to password self-service processes; MSP password management self-service; and password synchronization solutions. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Gladsaxe, Denmark.

HYPE.CO.summary: Hypefactors A/S operates as a software company that provides a technology platform. The company operates an artificial intelligence-based PR automation platform to power the PR workflow and various facts to document the results. It serves enterprises, small and medium sized companies, and PR agencies. The company is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

IMPERO.CO.summary: Impero A/S provides compliance management platform. Its platform is distributed as Software-as-a-Service that enables companies to easily manage compliance through automation of risk and control management, documentation, and reporting. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in ÃbyhÃ¸j, Denmark.

KONSOL.CO.summary: Konsolidator A/S develops and sells cloud based solutions. The company offers Konsolidator, a cloud-based financial consolidation software solutions. It also provides consultancy services. Konsolidator A/S was founded in 2016 and is based in SÃ¸borg, Denmark.

NANN.summary: Nanovation Microtech, Inc. develops and sells applications and games for iPhone, iPad, and Apple watches. The company was formerly known as Kalmin Corp. and changed its name to Nanovation Microtech, Inc. in July 2020. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark. Nanovation Microtech, Inc. is a subsidiary of Greenfield International Limited.

The company also offers digital workflow platforms; eTray, a digital workflow management software; and IT related consulting services. SHAPE.CO.summary: Shape Robotics A/S, an educational technology company, develops robot systems for education purpose worldwide. The company develops Fable, a robot system that offers educational robot kits for use in teaching programs, robotics, and innovations in middle and secondary schools, as well as in universities. It also offers Fable Connect, a telepresence robotics system that enables schools to get homebound students back in the classroom using the robot as a communication device. The company sells its products directly, as well as through distributors and resellers. Shape Robotics A/S was founded in 2011 and is based in Farum, Denmark.

SIM.CO.summary: SimCorp A/S, together with its subsidiaries, provides investment management solutions for asset management, fund management, insurance, life/pension, central banks, asset servicing, treasury, sovereign wealth, and wealth management companies. It provides SimCorp Dimension, an integrated system, which provides multi-asset class support across the investment value chain; SimCorp Sofia, a front-to-back investment management solution for the Italian insurance market; SimCorp Gain, an enterprise data management solution for reference and market data management; and SimCorp Coric, a solution for client communications and reporting automation. The company offers front office solutions, including alternative investment, asset, order, and compliance manager; middle office solutions, such as performance, risk mitigation, and strategy manager; and back office solutions comprising cash and securities, collateral, corporate actions, fund administration, general ledger, investment accounting, and settlement manager.  It also provides data and reporting solutions that include client communications, data warehouse, reconciliation, and enterprise data manager. In addition, the company offers regulatory compliance, managed business and data, managed application, operational, training, infrastructure and platform, value acceleration, and delivery services. The company has operations in North America, EMEA, and APAC countries. SimCorp A/S was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

TRST.L.summary: Trustpilot Group plc operates a review platform for businesses and consumers in the United Kingdom, North America, and internationally. Its online review platform that enables consumers to make purchasing decisions, and businesses to showcase their service. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.
